long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TimeTrakt allows you to track the time you spend on your tasks and projects with a few simple clicks. It also offers the ability to see how much time you are spending on your projects overall with charts and graphs. 

v2.0 --
- Replaced Web SQL with IndexedDB, all functionality restored.
